Posts.Content: Jan 29, 2014 05:28PM NewportCB wrote: Thank you for this.  I could use some direction.  I'm two years out from my first diagnosis (stage II, IDC) and was diagnosed less than 48 hours ago with metastatic breast cancer.  It appears 1-3 locations in bone only are involved.  MRI, scans of all types, blood tests, etc will come together with oncologist today.  Most of what I am reading is scaring my husband and I.  Where else on this site would you suggest I go to begin increasing my understanding? I feel lost.......
Posts.Title: "Limited" Metastatic Breast Cancer Springlakegirl jhammel
